Class CyprusDryClean

java.lang.Object
cyprusDryCleanApplication.CyprusDryClean
public class CyprusDryClean extends Object
The CyprusDryClean class manages a dry cleaning company's operations, including adding employees and customers, processing orders, and listing details. It provides methods for adding, deleting, and listing employees and customers, as well as managing orders and calculating costs for a customer on a given date. This class is the main hub of the application, containing various helper methods for handling the main tasks needed by the company.
Version:
23.0
Author:
Ferhat Kasim Koc

      cst - List of customers to initialize.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method that starts the application and presents the menu options. It uses a loop to keep the menu open until the user chooses to exit.
      Parameters:
      args - is Command line arguments but not used at this project

    • menu

      public void menu()
      Displays the main menu with available actions and asks the user to choose one.

    • addEmployee

      public void addEmployee()
      Adds a new employee to the system by prompting for details. Ensures that each employee has a unique ID.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int empId)
      Deletes an employee by their ID.
      Parameters:
      empId - The unique ID of the employee to delete.

    • listEmployeeDetails

      public void listEmployeeDetails(int empId)
      Lists details of a specific employee, including ID, name, surname, and dates.
      Parameters:
      empId - The unique ID of the employee.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer()
      Adds a new customer to the system by prompting for details. The customer's registration date is set to the current date.

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer(int customerId)
      Deletes a customer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique ID of the customer to delete.

    • getCustomerDetails

      public void getCustomerDetails(int customerId)
      Retrieves and displays details of a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique ID of the customer.

    • putOrder

      public void putOrder(int customerId)
      Creates an order for a specific customer by prompting for order details and assigns laundry items to employees randomly.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique ID of the customer placing the order.

    • getCustomerOrderDetails

      public void getCustomerOrderDetails(int customerId, Date orderDate)
      Shows all orders for a customer on a given date, with details about each laundry item.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique ID of the customer.
      orderDate - The date to search for orders.

    • getCustomerOrderTotalCost

      public void getCustomerOrderTotalCost(int customerId, Date orderDate)
      Calculates and displays the total cost of all orders for a specific customer on a particular date.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique ID of the customer.
      orderDate - The date to search for orders.

    • listEmployees

      public void listEmployees()
      Lists all employees in the system and their details.

    • listCustomers

      public void listCustomers()
      Lists all customers in the system and their details.

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Exits the program gracefully with a goodbye message.

      Returns:
      The Employee object if found, or null if not found.

    • parseDate

      public Date parseDate(String date)
      Parses a date from a string in the format "dd/MM/yyyy".
      Parameters:
      date - The string representing the date.
      Returns:
      The parsed Date object if successful, or null if the format is incorrect.

    • getRandomEmployee

      public Employee getRandomEmployee()

      Returns:
